Title: Last Tango in Agrestic
Plot: While Nancy is trying to figure out what do with Peter, she comes home to problems of plumbing that are related to Shane and his arrival into puberty. Celia enrolls Isabelle in boot camp and ends up getting sucked into it herself. Heylia is interested in a Nation of Islam member and his bean pies.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Ron Canada, Tom Kiesche, Rey Lucas, Indigo
